Name: Ellis Gourmet Burger
Review Text: It was a bit quite when we went in, but don‚Äôt let that fool you if it‚Äôs ever the case! After a little while the place was cozily busy. Rightfully so! The burgers (and nachos) were lovely, as was the staff. I would definitely recommend this place if you‚Äôre around and in the need of a good burger.

Name: Ellis Gourmet Burger
Review Text: Nice cozy place which serves very tasty burgers! The staff is friendly and you are served pretty quickly. They have a good selection of burgers and other goodies. The best thing is you can even get a gluten-free bun for no additional cost. ‚Ä¶

Name: Ellis Gourmet Burger
Review Text: Really nice place. One of my favourite burger joints whole visiting Amsterdam. Reasonably priced and good quality food. 40euros for 2 burgers and 2 drinks

Name: Ellis Gourmet Burger
Review Text: The Service was quite good but the burgers we ordered were small for the price we paid for. The classic burger was okay but a bit too cold. The Portobello burger says "grilled vegetables" but it had almost no vegetables on it. The Burger ‚Ä¶

Name: Ellis Gourmet Burger
Review Text: I had a very nice experience! The staff were really nice and were kind to switch the buns for iceberg lettuce (making it Keto friendly). Would highly recommend if looking for a keto friendly place in Amsterdam.

Name: Ellis Gourmet Burger
Review Text: Ellis Gourmet Burger - Today (15.03.2018)  I would give 6 stars as the burgers were free, but even if you have to pay for them, they are worth it. They are really one of the best in Amsterdam. Supertasty and the bread is perfect as well as ‚Ä¶

Name: Ellis Gourmet Burger
Review Text: The taste was okay. Unfortunately, when we got the food the burger was already cold. The service was friendly and gave us some tips for the city.

Name: Ellis Gourmet Burger
Review Text: The only disappointing thing about this place is the fact that there was nobody else eating here! The food was fantastic; fresh, quirky and well cooked, and the service was excellent. ‚Ä¶

Name: Ellis Gourmet Burger
Review Text: Yesterday in the afternoon we had some burgers me and my family. We had a amazing service even tho it was very busy. ‚Ä¶

Name: Ellis Gourmet Burger
Review Text: Really cosy. Has an actual fireplace. Great food and friendly staff. No problems at all.

Name: Ellis Gourmet Burger
Review Text: Place looked really good and thought it may be a good company as they have restaurants across Europe but never been so annoyed with a place. Very well done out, cool newspaper style menus and serving staff were great. But 45 minutes after ‚Ä¶

Name: Ellis Gourmet Burger
Review Text: Great burgers at a reasonble price. Especially love the fact that they have Belgian special beers at a normal price point (as in not overly priced for tourists), almost the same as if you were buying them in a Belgian bar. Would have added the fifth star if they paired the beers with a specific burger.

Name: Ellis Gourmet Burger
Review Text: Nice place to eat and interesting burgers. But they didn't get it right at all. Had to ask for the fries and for the second beer twice. Brought one burger with onions although we ordered without. And no word about the fact, that these ‚Ä¶

Name: Ellis Gourmet Burger
Review Text: Very good burgers and a nice and cosy place.

Name: Ellis Gourmet Burger
Review Text: We visited Ellis in Bruges and it was amazing. But this one was nowhere close. The burger wasn't hot or even crispy. It was a big disappointment, when compared to the Belgium one

Name: Ellis Gourmet Burger
Review Text: Great place for lunch outside the office. Friendly and fast service with very tasty food -definitely not your usual burger. Delicious coffee too!

Name: Ellis Gourmet Burger
Review Text: What a great place for a quick bite to eat and a beer!  The restaurant across the street was in the middle of their lunch/dinner changeover so the server actually recommended I come here.  Great advice.  :)

Name: Ellis Gourmet Burger
Review Text: Great manager, great food, great service. We've lived in Amsterdam 3 years and one can't always say this in a review. ‚Ä¶

Name: Ellis Gourmet Burger
Review Text:

Name: Ellis Gourmet Burger
Review Text: The Staff were very helpful and friendly! We got the food in no-time, and it tasted very good! Relaxing and cozy place!
